attributes.action: Invite America to join the Commonwealth
attributes.background: The UK and America will never have better friends than each other. With the UK leaving the EU and America's membership of the UN and Nato under debate, America joining the Commonwealth would challenge any perception of isolationism and would strengthen the bonds between our great nations.

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament don't control the membership of the Commonwealth. You can find out about the criteria for membership of the Commonwealth here:

http://thecommonwealth.org/history-of-the-commonwealth/new-criteria-commonwealth-membership
